entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 10 April 2023
